title: How to Make Eggless Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies

steps.headline: Grease a cookie sheet with butter or olive oil spray.
Combine brown sugar, sugar, and butter in a bowl or an electric mixer and stir with a spoon
Add vanilla, water, and vinegar to the mixture and mix until combined.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and then salt.
Pour flour mixture into the first bowl with the sugars.
Add oats into the mixture and stir.
Add raisins into the mixture and stir.
steps.description: The mixture will be quite thick!

steps.headline: Add pecans if desired and combine.
Roll dough in small balls the size of a silver dollar with your hands and put on cookie sheet
Take out cookies and let them cool for five minutes

text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees  Grease a cookie sheet with butter or olive oil spray.  Combine brown sugar, sugar, and butter in a bowl or an electric mixer and stir with a spoon  Add vanilla, water, and vinegar to the mixture and mix until combined.  In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and then salt.  Pour flour mixture into the first bowl with the sugars. Mix together. Add oats into the mixture and stir.  Add raisins into the mixture and stir. The mixture will be quite thick! Add pecans if desired and combine.  Roll dough in small balls the size of a silver dollar with your hands and put on cookie sheet  Bake for 10-12 minutes  Take out cookies and let them cool for five minutes  Finished.
